ygData.subject: Re: General grousing
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is some info for you, 1.  A Serpentine Bracer for 800pp is one of the worst deals you can get.  Even 2 for that much would be bad. The price has dropped
ygData.messageBody:
Here is some info for you,

1. A Serpentine Bracer for 800pp is one of the worst
deals you can get. Even 2 for that much would be bad.
The price has dropped recently so about 200-250 is a
decent range. Many high levels give them away for
free.

2. Monk equipment shouldn't matter that much. I will
admit that I have recieved some nice items from guild
members but what I would recomend you do is buy cured
silk armor. Pretty decent price.

3. You don't need to loot everything but don't think
its the end of the world if you go over your limit.
Try to hunt near a place you can sell.

4. 250pp is quite a bit, you must not buy much. I
only have about 140pp TOTAL at level 20. Of course I
support another character and have recently bought
some jewelry but still, don't consider yourself low on
cash.

Hammeron Stonspirit
Monk of Quellious
